Assuming the second half of the year keeps pace with the first half, more than 10 GW of data center capacity will go under construction this year. 

$NVDA $AMZN $MSFT $GOOG $ORCL $META

Data center supply in primary markets such as Northern Virginia, Dallas and Atlanta reached nearly 8.2 GW in the first half of 2025, up more than 43% YoY, per CBRE.

$NVDA $MSFT $AMZN $GOOG $ORCL $META

With Meta $META planning to spend $600 billion through 2028 for AI infrastructure, CEO Mark Zuckerberg has said that he would rather risk ‚Äúmisspending a couple of hundred billion" than to miss AI superintelligence.

$NVDA $AMD $AVGO

The AI data center server market is projected to grow at a 38% CAGR from 2024 to 2029, reaching more than $580 billion, or 5x from 2024‚Äôs $115 billion.

The Mat Hold pattern indicates a brief consolidation or hesitation within a strong trend, followed by a robust continuation of that trend, making it a valuable tool for traders to confirm trend persistence and time entries effectively.
